mapper.sql: select wine_details_id, work_order_id, tenant_id, busy_id, liquor_batch_id, pottery_altar_id, busy_status, pottery_altar_apply_weight, weighing_tank, pump_id, weighing_tank_weight, operation_time, sampling_purpose, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from laocz_wine_details
mapper.select: SELECT lwd.wine_details_id, lpam.pottery_altar_number FROM laocz_wine_details lwd LEFT JOIN laocz_pottery_altar_management lpam ON lwd.pottery_altar_id = lpam.pottery_altar_id WHERE lwd.busy_id = #{busyId}

SELECT lwtp.use_mark as useMark, gpi.point_id as pointId, gpi.point_name as pointName, gpi.point_type as pointType FROM laocz_wine_details lwd LEFT JOIN laocz_weighing_tank_point lwtp ON lwd.weighing_tank = lwtp.weighing_tank_id LEFT JOIN grass_point_info gpi ON lwtp.point_primary_key = gpi.id WHERE lwd.wine_details_id = #{wineDetailsId}

SELECT lpp.use_mark as useMark, gpi.point_id as pointId, gpi.point_name as pointName, gpi.point_type as pointType FROM laocz_wine_details lwd LEFT JOIN laocz_pump_point lpp ON lwd.pump_id = lpp.pump_id LEFT JOIN grass_point_info gpi ON lpp.point_primary_key = gpi.id WHERE lwd.wine_details_id = #{wineDetailsId}
